I'm a big fan of TBBT; this dvd is a nice idea, although I think the producers jumped the gun on this one since
at the time, there were only 3 Christmas episodes that aired; since then, there have been two more:
'' season7 epis11 (The Cooper Extraction)" and "season8 epis 11 (The Clean Room Infiltration)"; I would suggest that they release
a "Premium" version that would include all five Christmas themed episodes, (unless they intend to do one this year (season 10).

It would make for a 5 episode, 100 min. approx, and why not add a gag reel for good measure; I think fans would agree to buy that one also;
I have all 9 seasons, I just love the non stop viewing without commercials;  just a thought, bravo to the writers for keeping the series fresh and fun. Love the gang and hope for lots more to come :-)

Funny holiday compilation

I do not own the shows DVD sets and although I like the show, in syndication it is readily available to watch random episodes, day and night. And, I am generally content to watch it in repeats that way. But, during the last holiday season when I hoped to see one of holiday episodes, whenever I was watching they were not playing and I was too lazy/busy to track them down or DVR them. So, for my situation this DVD of three holiday shows -- one episode from season two (Bath Item Gift Hypothesis), one from three (Maternal Congruence) and one from season six (Santa Simulation)  makes sense.

The picture quality is not HD but it is clear and crisp just not quite as sharp  it is regular television quality. For people with the DVD sets this purchase may be superfluous, but for those of us without the discs but wishing to view these episodes during the holiday season, this is a good solution.

With this DVD package you get the three Christmas episodes (which means the events in these episodes take place around Christmas time). The three episodes are;

1. "The Bath Item Gift Hypothesis" - Season 2, Episode 11 (Penny makes the mistake of giving Sheldon a gift).

2. "The Maternal Congruence" - Season 3, Episode 11 (Leonard's mother comes to visit).

3. "The Santa Simulation" - Season 6, Episode 11 (A D&D Quest to the north pole).

This set is a good way to get these three particular episodes without having to purchase the whole season sets. I enjoyed watching all three.
Perfect

I love this dvd as I can watch my favorite episodes without having to get out the whole series sets. If you love the Big Bang Theory it is worth getting and if you collecet Holiday dvd's as I do, it winds up being a perfect buy.

I love the Big Bang and love these episodes.  I have the entire collection.....However, for the prices and the quality of DVD, 3 stars is being generous. On top of it, only 3 episodes.  A full season costs the same almost. The DVD quality reminds me of the bootleg items you buy at the swapmeet.  I thought it was my DVD player, but I placed another DVD and picture quality, everything was fine.

Will I return it, I should but the Big Bang fan in me told me just to keep it.  Would I have purchased it knowing this - no, I probably wouldn't have.
